title: Ireland set to end abortion ban by landslide margin
text:
Ireland set to end abortion ban by landslide margin 11:33am BST - 01:20
With counting underway after Friday's vote on whether to liberalize Ireland's restrictive abortion laws, exit polls point to a landslide victory for repealing the current ban. The main anti-abortion campaign has also conceded defeat. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
With counting underway after Friday's vote on whether to liberalize Ireland's restrictive abortion laws, exit polls point to a landslide victory for repealing the current ban.
